title: Acute Posterior Multifocal Placoid Pigment Epitheliopathy (APMPPE)
description: APMPPE is an acquired inflammatory uveitis and an uncommon White Dot Syndrome. On OCT it is characterised by hyper-reflectivity from the OPL to the RPE with normal retinal thickness. Some patients may have subretinal fluid or intraretinal cysts.
